title: Local Services - 75-Word Lead Gen
prompt:
Write a {{channel}} outreach for a {{industry}} {{role}} offering {{service}} in {{city}}. Tone: {{tone}}. Include one proof ({{proof_point}}) and a single CTA to book a {{time_window}} using {{cta_link}}. Keep under {{word_limit}} words.

---
OUTCOME CARD
Use when: Leads/Appointments
Fill: {{city}} {{cta_link}} {{time_window}} {{tone}}
Attach: proof/case + calendar link
Send to: prospects in {{city}}
Expected: reply or booking

title: Operations - Overdue Invoice Follow-Up
prompt:
Write a {{channel}} follow-up for Invoice {{invoice_number}} ({{amount}}) sent {{sent_date}}. Tone: {{tone}}. Include payment link {{cta_link}} and two optional call slots. Cap at {{word_limit}} words.

---
OUTCOME CARD
Use when: Invoice Collections
Fill: {{city}} {{cta_link}} {{time_window}} {{tone}}
Attach: invoice PDF, payment link, prior thread
Send to: accounting/contact
Expected: payment or call confirm

title: Merchant - Network-Safe Chargeback Letter
prompt:
Draft a representment for {{network}} {{reason_code}}. Include {{order_id}}, {{amount}}, {{order_date}} and evidence (IP/device, AVS/CVV, 3-D Secure, delivery, comms). Map evidence to criteria. Ask for reversal.

---
OUTCOME CARD
Use when: Win Chargebacks
Fill: {{city}} {{cta_link}} {{time_window}} {{tone}}
Attach: receipts, IP/device, AVS/CVV, 3-D Secure, delivery, comms
Send to: processor/issuer
Expected: reversal

title: Pricing - Margin Impact Playbook
prompt:
Given competitor prices and cost basis {{cost_basis}}, output top 10 price moves with estimated margin delta and risks. Prioritize.

---
OUTCOME CARD
Use when: Pricing/Margins
Fill: {{city}} {{cta_link}} {{time_window}} {{tone}}
Attach: price CSV, cost basis
Send to: stakeholder
Expected: approved copy/actions

title: Landing - Value Prop & Hero
prompt:
For {{industry}} {{service}}, write a hero headline (<=10), subhead (<=18), three benefits, and a primary CTA label. Output compact JSON.

---
OUTCOME CARD
Use when: Landing Page Copy
Fill: {{city}} {{cta_link}} {{time_window}} {{tone}}
Attach: relevant artifact(s)
Send to: stakeholder
Expected: approved copy/actions

title: Chargebacks - Network-Safe Letter
prompt: Draft a representment for {{network}} {{reason_code}}. Include {{order_id}}, {{amount}}, IP/device, AVS/CVV, delivery, comms. Map evidence to issuer criteria. Ask for reversal.

title: ClientReach - Overdue Invoice Nudge
prompt: Follow-up for Invoice {{invoice_number}} ({{amount}}) sent {{sent_date}}. Include one payment link {{pay_url}} and two call slots. Tone: confident, respectful, direct.

title: Lead Gen - Local Services (75)
prompt: Write a {{channel}} for a {{industry}} {{role}} offering {{service}} in {{city}}. Include one proof ({{proof_point}}) and a CTA to book a {{time_window}} at {{cta_link}}. Keep under {{word_limit}} words.

title: Landing - 10-second Hero
prompt: For {{industry}} {{service}}, output hero headline (<=10 words), subhead (<=18), 3 benefits, and a primary CTA. Return JSON.
